issue.title: [C++][Python][Dataset] Support C Data Interface with Scanner
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12687](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12687). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There are lots of ways we could do this:
 \* Direct support on the Scanner
 \* A generic exporter for any RecordBatchIterator
 \* A way to wrap a Scanner and/or RecordBatchIterator as  RecordBatchReader
